properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Cape Blanco OR to Pt. St. George CA out 10 nm
properties.headline: Gale Watch issued January 1 at 2:23PM PST until January 3 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, south winds 25 to 35 kt
with gusts up to 40 kt and seas 12 to 17 feet at 19 seconds.
For the Gale Watch, south winds 25 to 35 kt with gusts up to
40 kt and building seas 11 to 15 feet at 14 seconds possible.

* WHERE...For small craft, all areas. For Gale watch, beyond 2 NM
except south of Pistol River beyond 6 NM.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 10 PM PST Friday.
For the Gale Watch, from Friday afternoon through Friday
evening.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds and very steep seas could capsize or
damage vessels. Low visibility conditions are expected.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid strong winds and
very steep seas. Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course,
and/or secure the vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST FRIDAY... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING
